casebody.data:
James FLAHERTY, petitioner,
v.
JUSTICES OF the HAVERHILL DIVISION OF the DISTRICT COURT DEPARTMENT OF the TRIAL COURT, et al. No. 13-183. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 7, 2013.

Case below, 83 Mass.App.Ct. 120, 981 N.E.2d 745.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Appeals Court of Massachusetts denied.
